content: I noticed that in the module docstring of https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib_docs/algebra/quaternion.html#quaternion the variable a is linkified because docs#a exists. Should we namespace it?
this happens more often, for instance we have docs#f and docs#F
This is all outside the main mathlib. Maybe the relevant linkifier should simply no consider those. But of course fully namespacing those files would also be very reasonnable.
Yeah, having the archive in the docs is great, but there are a few tweaks to be made still.
